item.title: Ernst & Young Blockchain Startup Challenge: send your idea | HolyTransaction
item.description:
Ernst & Young Blockchain Startup Challenge: send your idea | HolyTransaction

The well-known company Ernst & Young revealed a new startup contest held in London, to "explore how blockchain technology can tackle challenges in digital rights management and energy trading."

item.title: Florida Judge Defines Bitcoin As Property Rather Than Money
item.description:
Florida Judge Defines Bitcoin As Property Rather Than Money

Depending on how one wants to look at the situation, the judge ruling Bitcoin isn't money is both good and bad at the same time. The judge ruled Bitcoin to be property, which may very well set a precedent for future Bitcoin-related court cases.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Today's Scalp Strategy - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Today's Scalp Strategy - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this morning. It's Tuesday morning out of Europe, and time to take our first look of the day at the bitcoin price.

item.title: Bright Future for Bitcoin After Florida Case Dismissal
item.description:
Bright Future for Bitcoin After Florida Case Dismissal

A Florida judge has dismissed long-standing charges against Michel Espinoza, accused since 2014 of illegal money transmission and money laundering for selling bitcoin. Also read: Gibraltar Lands First European Bitcoin ETI The case and decision are now likely to have widespread positive implications for Bitcoin in the South Florida region, said the defense's main expert witness.

item.title: Roger Ver Challenges Bernie Sanders Again, Raises Offer to $250K
item.description:
Roger Ver Challenges Bernie Sanders Again, Raises Offer to $250K

Back in March Bitcoin.com Also read: Enemies Of The Sharing Economy reported on investor Roger Ver challenging the Vermont senator, Bernie Sanders to debate with Adam Kokesh. Ver had offered $100,000 to get Sanders to discuss Socialism Vs. Libertarianism with the Iraq war combat veteran turned peace activist.

item.title: 'Terminator Plan' Calls Bitcoin Governance into Question
item.description:
'Terminator Plan' Calls Bitcoin Governance into Question

At the start of July, rumors of a "Terminator Plan" shook the Bitcoin community to its core, creating talk of mutiny among Chinese bitcoin miners, forcing Bitcoin Core out of the picture. Disclaimer: This article was provided by the Vanbex Group.

item.title: While Shrem, Ulbricht Enjoy Cults of Personality, Shavers Abandoned by Bitcoin Community
item.description:
While Shrem, Ulbricht Enjoy Cults of Personality, Shavers Abandoned by Bitcoin Community

Trendon Shavers earned a lenient sentence through good faith efforts to right the wrongs he did while improperly managing the Bitcoin Savings & Trust, Bitcoin's first federal securities case, according to his sentencing judge. That's news the Bitcoin Community, which has long viewed Shavers as a no more than a fraudster, likely won't heed.

item.title: The Case for Ethereum Classic - NEWSBTC
item.description:
The Case for Ethereum Classic - NEWSBTC

The Ethereum hard fork to bail out the DAO Project was successful, but not without its consequences. Many assumed the old chain would simply die, however it has not only survived, but continues to grow under the name Ethereum Classic (ETC). This has forced cryptocurrency investors to make a choice on the immutability issue...

item.title: Gibraltar Stock Exchange welcomes BitcoinETI
item.description:
Gibraltar Stock Exchange welcomes BitcoinETI

The Gibraltar Stock Exchange welcomes BitcoinETI (ticker: BTCETI), an asset-backed Exchange Traded Instrument that is invested exclusively in bitcoin, making it the first European regulated product for the leading digital currency. The Bitcoin Exchange Traded Instrument (ETI) was approved for admission to listing on GSX on 22-Jul-2015 and will be co-listed on Deutsche BÃ¶rse this week under the symbol "BTCETI".

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/26/2016 - Reversal Formation Seen! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/26/2016 - Reversal Formation Seen! - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price has formed a head and shoulders pattern on its short-term time frame and is currently testing the neckline. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price has formed a head and shoulders pattern on its short-term time frame and is currently testing the neckline.
